quiz_item.error_analysis: 中国学生易因形近词“dime”（一角硬币）误解“dine”为“支付”，或因“dinner”（晚餐）关联误解为“做晚餐”。
quiz_item.sentence: We plan to **dine** at the fancy French restaurant tonight to celebrate our promotion.

option.definition: to cook a meal for the evening
to pay for something using a small coin
to have dinner, especially in a formal setting
